title: A moral essay concerning the nature and unreasonableness of pride in which the most plausible pretences of this vice are examined, in a conference between Philotimus and Philalethes. Licensed August 17. 1689.
author: Collier, Jeremy, 1650-1726.
publisher: printed for Joseph Hindmarsh, at the Golden Ball in Cornhil,
notes: By Jeremy Collier, whose name appears on the title page of the second edition.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
